data.title: Hooray Henrik
data.meta_description: HENRIK Pedersen hit a second half equaliser as Bolton Wanderers reserves drew 1-1 against Blackburn Rovers at Morecambe's Christie Park.
data.text:
In an entertaining battle against their Lancashire rivals, Wanderers' Danish striker headed home former Rovers' winger Ryan Baldacchino's cross to cancel out Jonathan Douglas' effort just before the break.

New signing Kostas Konstantinidis did not feature in the game because his international clearance arrived after the deadline for the game.

However, if selected, the Greek defender will be in the first team squad for Saturday's clash against Aston Villa at the Reebok.
